name: Hollow Town
description:
A 3d collectathon platformer using the Stride Engine in MVU style. Explore the city to collect all 14 candy bags and return to the center as fast as you can to win.

Buildings/Roads by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Streets props/Plants by @Zsky (www.patreon.com/Zsky)

Shrine/Candles by Kay Lousberg (www.kaylousberg.com)

BlenderToStrideAnimationSeparator Blender Extension

Music by Scott Arc

Sound Effect - https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc

Repository link: https://github.com/vtquan/FSharp-Game-Jam
